Constructor for Sparse Matrix (with array inputs)

Parameters:
nonZeroValues - The double array of non zero values in the matrix.
columnPositions - The column positions of those non zero values.
rowStarts - The i to, but not including, i + 1 indices of the non zero values contained in each row.
